Name: Boxing Apocalypse
About the game: Trapped in an alien prison, you must fight your way to freedom in this action combat game featuring a fully immersive, intuitive fight system. Complete with Power punches, finishing moves, interchangeable weapons, an energy shield for block/counter combos, a customizable armor system, and a challenge board to increase ranks among prisoners. Campaign: • 21 challenges • 5 levels • Fight the alien horde plus 2 boss battles • Finishing moves (knocking heads off, shattering bodies) • Power punches (achieved from skilled combinations) • Boss fight with fatality to win the game • Energy shields for creative counterpunch combos • Tutorial training • Cut scenes Multiplayer: • Leveling up factions (5): Joker, Alien Slayer, Boss, King, The One • Win/loss record • Hit points vary with weapon • Customization of armor, gauntlets, weapons • Live voice chat By Creator/Designer Mario Simone Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
